title: The Only Normal Human In The Universe - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Mecha   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Animal Characteristics   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Cultivation   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Dense Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Familial Love   Futuristic Setting   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Hidden Abilities   Honest Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Medical Knowledge   Naive Protagonist   Pharmacist   Possessive Characters   Shy Characters   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Transformation Ability   Transmigration   Wealthy Characters
author: 送君十里
description:
As a hamster spirit that has been cultivated for thousands of years, An Yan's greatest wish was to succeed in his transformation.

However, when he was just one step away from his transformation, he somehow crossed over to the interstellar age and became the only human who could maintain his normal form.

In response, An Yan just wanted to cry out in his heart, 'Who is the demon?'

However, becoming a human being wasn’t that bad.

He was making potions, making a lot of money, abusing scum, and living a prosperous life.

But then, he turned back into a hamster!

An Yan: Squeak?

Cheng Yi: This hamster is so cute; it’s perfect for roasting.

An Yan: Squeak?!
>
